div.head: CHAP. CXXXVI.
An exhortation to giue thankes to God for particular mercies.
div.ab: O giue thankes vnto the Lord, for hee is good: for his mercy endureth for euer. Psa.106.1. and 107. 1. and 118. 1.
O giue thankes vnto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for euer.
O giue thankes to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for euer.
To him who alone doth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for euer.
To him that by wisedome made the heauens: for his mercy endureth for euer. Gen.1. 1.
To him that stretched out the earth aboue the waters: for his mercy endureth for euer. Gen.1.6. ier.10.12.
To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for euer. Gen.1.14.
The sunne to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for euer. Heb. for the rulings by day.
The moone and starres to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for euer.
To him that smote Egypt in their first borne: for his mercy endureth for euer. Exod.12. 29.
And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for euer. Exod. 13. 17.
With a strong hand and with a stretched out arme: for his mercy endureth for euer.
To him which diuided the red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for euer. Exod. 14. 21.22.
And made Israel to passe through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for euer.
But ouerthrewe Pharaoh and his hoste in the red sea: for his mercy endureth for euer. Exod.14. 28. , Heb. shaked off.
To him which led his people through the wildernesse: for his mercy endureth for euer. Exod. 15. 22.
To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for euer.
And slue famous kings: for his mercy endureth for euer. Deut. 29 7. psal. 135. 10, & 11.
Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for euer. Num.21. 23.
And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for euer. Num.21. 33.
And gaue their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for euer. Iosh.12.7.
Euen an heritage vnto Israel his seruant: for his mercy endureth for euer.
Who remembred vs in our lowe estate: for his mercy endureth for euer.
And hath redeemed vs from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for euer.
Who giueth foode to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for euer.
O giue thankes vnto the God of heauen: for his mercy endureth for euer.
